Generation V.Black: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck's horns.
Generation V.White: The plants growing on its horns change according to the season. The leaders of the herd possess magnificent horns.
Generation V.Black 2: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.
Generation V.White 2: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.

Generation VI.X: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck's horns.
Generation VI.Y: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck's horns.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It’s said that Sawsbuck are calm and easy to tame during the season when they take on this form, so it’s the perfect time to make one your partner.
Generation IX.Violet: Though there are many enthusiasts for Sawsbuck as a species, this seasonal form in particular is not very popular.

Generation VI.X: Friend Safari ( Grass ) ( Spring Form ) Pokémon Bank ( Summer/Autumn/Winter Forms )
Generation VI.Y: Friend Safari ( Grass ) ( Spring Form ) Pokémon Bank ( Summer/Autumn/Winter Forms )
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Evolve Deerling ( Spring Form ) Pokémon Bank ( Summer/Autumn/Winter Forms )
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Evolve Deerling ( Spring Form ) Pokémon Bank ( Summer/Autumn/Winter Forms )
